Talk1031:

creature with my own eyes.
It's never a bad idea to get a second
opinion on things.<sp:5:0:0> Hah, that's why editors

Anyway, let's <clr:0000>meet at the site<clr:ffff>. I'm

Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Careful there, partner. You went and
scared all the little birds away! It's way
too late to be so loud...
You go storming around like that and it
won't just be birds you send flying for
the hills!
It's fine though. I did hear some
interesting chirps and warbles from them.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Ah, I see, I see. So it was one of the rare
animals here that Princess Zelda was
seen riding.
And, in fact, the princess was also
researching these creatures!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Wow, rumors really can get out of hand,
can't they?

I mean, it's hardly a mountain of a beast,
and all that talk of brutal tusks was just
plain wrong. Such gentle creatures!
That's why a good reporter must confirm
the details before they go to print.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>You did a really good job, partner.
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I caught sight of you while I was looking
into things at the stable here.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:0000>Monsters tend to get more active<clr:ffff> when
the sun sets. Be careful if you're heading
out to investigate.
Talk1023:

Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I don't want to say this too loud and start
a panic, but...

<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:ffff>Rumors are spreading about <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>—that
she's been seen riding some mysterious beast.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01><sp:0:2:2:6400>It's said to be a mountain of a beast
too—one with huge, brutal tusks.

My little reporters had never seen
something so frightening!

Of course, what made it far worse was
that it seemed...<sp:5:0:0>like the princess herself
was controlling this terrifying creature.
Talk1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>So...<sp:5:0:0>it wasn't a beast at all, just a <clr:0000>newly
discovered animal<clr:ffff> called a Dondon.

And it was Princess Zelda herself
conducting research on them!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Wow, rumors can really get out of hand,
can't they?

I mean, it's hardly a mountain of a beast.
Not even a small hill. All that talk of brutal
tusks was overblown too.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's why a good reporter must confirm
the details before they go to print!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>You did a good job, partner.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>I find it hard to believe a beast like that
could really be lurking in Hyrule.

But if this terrifying monster exists, then
the implications...<sp:5:0:0>make this a very, very
huge story.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You know, there were guests <clr:0000>at this
stable <clr:ffff>talking about some kind of
<clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>My little bird informants told me that
there have been a number of sightings in
the <clr:0000>subtropical region in the south<clr:ffff>.
If we want to learn more, we should dive
beak-first into this stable and others to
see if there's any truth to these rumors.
Talk1051:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>I'm gonna hurry back and get the real
story published. <sp:5:1:0>You take care, partner!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:LaughS>We just need to peck away at this until we
figure out if it's an enticing truth or an
elaborate fiction...
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>A <clr:0000>beast<clr:ffff> that's rumored to be a mountain
of a creature and has huge, brutal tusks...

We might have a real situation here if...<sp:5:0:0>
the princess really is controlling it.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Well, for now we need to gather
more information.

There was a visitor here talking about
sightings of the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff> in a
<clr:0000>subtropical region to the south<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Hopefully you can pluck out some more
details by checking in at <clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff>...
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>A beast that's rumored to be a mountain
of a creature, has huge, brutal tusks, and
is controlled by <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> herself...
I've heard of sightings in the <clr:0000>subtropical
region in the south<clr:ffff>, but...

There were visitors here who were talking
about the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>. Hopefully we
can find some facts at stables.
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hold on! You're saying you've <clr:0000>seen the

be riding on?
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Huh. A new species called a Dondon. I'd

no one had ever seen before...
There's still something missing though.
It'd be a crime to put out the story in
this state.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Could <clr:0000>I talk to that caretaker<clr:ffff> you heard
the story from? I want to see this with my
own eyes.
It's never a bad idea to get a second
opinion on things. That's why editors
exist!<sp:5:0:0> Anyway, let's <clr:0000>meet at the site<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm counting on you, partner!
